description:
Animate Pro! gives you the power to create, save, share and enjoy your own animations. We provide the canvas, you provide the imagination! Take full control of your scene using our suite of drawing and animation tools, including the ability to adjust the frame rate and add a shared background. Onion skins give you the ability to see where you came from as you move forward with your animation to help you make your animation as smooth as possible. Download Animate Pro! today to get started with hours of pure enjoyment.

** The Free Version is Ad Supported, and doesn't allow for saving and loading.  For full featured and no ads, please support us by downloading the full version!
